00024 #ifndef __OPENNSL_TRUNK_H__
00025 #define __OPENNSL_TRUNK_H__
00026 
00027 #include <opennsl/types.h>
00028 
00029 #define OPENNSL_TRUNK_MAX_PORTCNT   256        
00031 #define OPENNSL_TRUNK_UNSPEC_INDEX  -1         
00032 #define OPENNSL_TRUNK_PSC_SRCDSTMAC 3          
00033 #define OPENNSL_TRUNK_PSC_DSTIP     5          
00034 #define OPENNSL_TRUNK_PSC_SRCDSTIP  6          
00035 #define OPENNSL_TRUNK_PSC_PORTFLOW  9          
00036 #define OPENNSL_TRUNK_FLAG_FAILOVER_NEXT    0x0001     
00039 #define OPENNSL_TRUNK_FLAG_FAILOVER_NEXT_LOCAL 0x0002     
00043 #define OPENNSL_TRUNK_FLAG_FAILOVER         OPENNSL_TRUNK_FLAG_FAILOVER_NEXT_LOCAL 
00045 #define OPENNSL_TRUNK_FLAG_WITH_ID          0x0010     
00047 #define OPENNSL_TRUNK_FLAG_IPMC_CLEAVE      0x0020     
00050 #define OPENNSL_TRUNK_MEMBER_EGRESS_DISABLE 0x0002     
00055 typedef struct opennsl_trunk_info_s {
00056     int psc;            
00057     int dlf_index;      
00058     int mc_index;       
00059     int ipmc_index;     
00060 } opennsl_trunk_info_t;
00061 /* __doxy_func_body_end__ */
00062 
00064 typedef struct opennsl_trunk_chip_info_s {
00065     int trunk_group_count;      
00066     int trunk_id_min;           
00067     int trunk_id_max;           
00068     int trunk_ports_max;        
00070     int trunk_fabric_id_min;    
00071     int trunk_fabric_id_max;    
00072     int trunk_fabric_ports_max; 
00074     int vp_id_min;              
00075     int vp_id_max;              
00076     int vp_ports_max;           
00078 } opennsl_trunk_chip_info_t;
00079 /* __doxy_func_body_end__ */
00080 
00082 typedef struct opennsl_trunk_member_s {
00083     uint32 flags;           
00084     opennsl_gport_t gport;  
00085     int reserved1; 
00086     int reserved2; 
00087 } opennsl_trunk_member_t;
00088 /* __doxy_func_body_end__ */
